name: Science and Technology for a Brighter Future
about: This Givelist supports nonprofits dedicated to ending the abuse of animals raised for food.

sponsor.description: We will contribute an extra donation on top of yours, to the same value (up to $25 per donation). These matching funds are kindly provided by Every.org up to a total value of $10,000

nonprofits.name: Usona Institute
nonprofits.about: Usona is dedicated to furthering the understanding of the therapeutic effects of consciousness-expanding medicines.

nonprofits.name: The Center for Human-Compatible AI
